About

Why did I make this tool?
I was bored over my summer break and was learning data analytics over the summer. As a humble grad student, I couldn't help but be astounded by the awe-inspiring standards set by the remarkable women in my midst. It was this peculiar blend of tedium and fascination that ultimately compelled me to fashion this ingenious tool.
